title: My version of barley and sweetcorn stew
ingredients: ['1 ear sweetcorn on the cob', '4 tablespoons pearl barley', '2 tablespoons garden peas or broad beans', '1 small potato, diced into 1 to 2cm pieces', '1 to 2 teaspoons sunflower or vegetable oil', '2 teaspoons butter', '1/2 leek, sliced into rings', '1 clove garlic, minced (or 1 teaspoon garlic granules)', '300ml vegetable stock, warmed', '3 tablespoons semi-skimmed milk', 'salt and cracked black pepper, to taste']
